title: Elementary Mathematics Education Material Design: Applying Design-Based Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A course developing elementary mathematics educational material design competencies through smartphone-based learning in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four core categories of design-based instruction: motivation, pedagogical methods, language use, and mathematical meaning construction
Learners can understand and explain the design principles for mathematics educational materials for elementary learners in low-income regions
Learners can plan and produce mobile-friendly mathematics educational content in resource-constrained technological environments
Learners can develop educational material prototypes suitable for actual classroom implementation through project-based assessment

resources: Basic Mobile Apps (Google Docs, Canva, etc.)
South African Mathematics Education Case Study Materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
